index.title: Hello 👋🏼
index.subtitle: I'm
index.bio:
Hello ! I'm Alexandre Dissi, a 25-year-old full stack developer with a passion for creating remarkable digital experiences. Currently a Master's student at Sup de Vinci Paris, I'm showcasing my design and development skills through this portfolio.

My career path has led me to explore a variety of web technologies such as JavaScript, PHP, as well as frameworks such as React, Next.js, Vue.js, Symfony and Express. My approach focuses on enhancing the user experience and creating aesthetic and intuitive interfaces.
index.instamintDescription: InstaMint is an NFT platform, Crypto, which is an instagram clone linked to cryptocurrency to allow users to exchange, sell and buy NFT in a quick and easy way.
index.boilerplateDescription: I've created a Next.js boilerplate to make it easier to create Next.js projects. Is preconfigured with TailwindCSS, and other tools to help you get started quickly.
index.gretaDescription: I've created a distance learning platform that allows students to follow different courses in different formats (video, text, PDF).
index.namemaxlength: First name must be less than 32 characters
index.messagemaxlength: Message must be less than 1000 characters
